dmca.title: Stolen content
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Debra/Alliance-Link [mailto:debra@alliance-link.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, September 12, 2006 10:44 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Stolen content
Subject: Fw: Stolen content


Emailing to a new email address with request to have page removed per
DMCA guidelines.
 
----- Original Message ----- 
From: Debra/Alliance-Link <mailto:debra@alliance-link.com>  
To: abuse@theplanet.com 
Sent: Monday, September 11, 2006 10:54 PM
Subject: Fw: Stolen content

Second request.  Please have this page removed as per the DMCA.  
 
----- Original Message ----- 
From: Debra/Alliance-Link <mailto:debra@alliance-link.com>  
To: abuse@theplanet.com 
Sent: Thursday, September 07, 2006 9:02 PM
Subject: Stolen content

This website:  www.internetmarketingorlando.com has 

taken a full page of content off my site
http://www.alliance-link.com/custom-link-building.htm  and placed it
here:
 
http://internetmarketingorlando.com/v2/index.php?option=com_content&task
=view&id=18&Itemid=41
 
Since the www.internetmarketingorlando.com site was created in Feb 2006
and as you can see through Archive.org my pages have been online longer
 
http://web.archive.org/web/20050301063658/alliance-link.com/custom-link-
campaigns.htm
 
I want internetmarketingorlando.com to remove my verbiage at once.
 
thank you.
 
 
Debra O. Mastaler
Alliance-Link
http://thelinkspiel.blogspot.com
